name: The Doors (Nomad Creation)
description:
hello everyone,
Thank you for coming here. welcome to my first video game " The Doors" which is proudly the smallest game in the world and probably the least effort put into it!!
This is a text-based adventure where you play as yourself. You are posed with two choices in front of you.But the choice is your to make.
This game uses no engines whatsoever and is made in one day by me.All criticism is welcomed.
If you download this game and have a bad time.I am sorry for you, as this game is made for people who have a hobby to play bad games and enjoy them.
if you are not interested,its probably because this game is not for you.

The whole experience can be taken in a few seconds!!!
And god may bless your soul if you are a speedrunner!!!

That being said this is a experience not all will enjoy (Sorry for not providing any screenshots,I think the logo pretty much speaks for itself)

Please support me on youtube @Hmmble

Thank you for whoever plays this game  ;)

  • And also, a tip for all of you guys who are playing, press (Alt+Enter)Keys to enlarge the window (in which you would be playing)
